name: Growin' Around
description:
Keys ActionKey JumpW Move LeftA Move RightD Glide (Upcoming)S Hook (Upcoming)Q Give MassE Earn MassF Switch ItemShift Use ItemSpace The Idea

Platform game where the character is a plant-humanoid and will be surrounded by plants in a scenario similar to a laboratory where experiments were done with them. These other plants can be used to swap sizes and overcome obstacles.

How i working

In other jams I couldn't finish their games because I was too ambitious with the ideas, so in this jam I tried to stick to a simple idea.

I wanted to create a plattformer game, so i started thinking ideas for an application of the theme taking in account the genre. Then, with the idea setted, i create a board of task in GitHub to schedule what to do next and organice myself.

Mostly i follow this tasks, but i always have to do two or three in parallel because i want to test and debug them right away.

Tecnology

I am using Godot Engine.

Issues

I having issues with the assets, i dont know how to create them and i spend a lot of time searching for them with no adecuate results, so i ended using the first i find.

Currently I'm looking for a 2D artist, if you are interested this is my Discord Emilio Martin#6841.
